CustomField.description: This formula is dangerously close to the maximum size at over 4,300 characters and feels a bit like a hack.
CustomField.formula: IF( Account.Parent.BillingStreet & '|' & Account.Parent.BillingCity & '|' & TEXT(Account.Parent.BillingStateCode) & '|' & Account.Parent.BillingPostalCode & '|' & TEXT(Account.Parent.BillingCountryCode) = Account.BillingStreet & '|' & Account.BillingCity & '|' & TEXT(Account.BillingStateCode) & '|' & Account.BillingPostalCode &'|' & TEXT(Account.BillingCountryCode), "Deliver to Same Address", IF( Contact.MailingStreet & '|' & Contact.MailingCity & '|' & TEXT(Contact.MailingStateCode) & '|' & Contact.MailingPostalCode & '|' = Account.BillingStreet & '|' & Account.BillingCity & '|' & TEXT(Account.BillingStateCode) & '|' & Account.BillingPostalCode &'|', "Deliver to Same Address", ( Account.BillingStreet & BR() & Account.BillingCity & ", " & TEXT(Account.BillingStateCode) & " " & Account.BillingPostalCode ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for Conga Coupons; uses Account's Parent address if set, otherwise, Account's address
CustomField.label: Conga Coupon Delivery Address
